# File test/external/io_test.rb, line 7
  def std_class_test(data)
    Tempfile.open("file_test") do |tempfile|
      tempfile << data
      tempfile.flush
    
      File.open(tempfile.path, "r+") do |file|
        file.extend IO
        yield(file)
      end
    end
    
    Tempfile.open("tempfile_test") do |tempfile|
      tempfile << data
      tempfile.extend IO

      yield(tempfile)
    end
    
    Tempfile.open("strio_test") do |tempfile|
      tempfile << data
      tempfile.flush
    
      tempfile.pos = 0
      StringIO.open(tempfile.read, "r+") do |file|
        file.extend IO
        yield(file)
      end
    end
  end
